remarks: Property of a disjoint collection: if ` B ( X ) = C ` and ` B ( Y ) = D ` , and ` X =/= Y ` , then ` C ` and ` D ` are disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)

disji.2 $e |- ( x = Y -> B = D ) $.
